title: Mystery Science Theater 3000 MST3K Extras DVDrip AVC AC3
description:
Mystery Science Theater 3000 MST3K Extras DVDrip AVC AC3

The DVD Extras share includes all non-movie items from Rhino and Shout Single and Volume DVD releases up to and including Shout Volume XXXIII 33:

* a total of 312 videos with a running time of 37hours 08minutes 10seconds (MKV-AVC/AC3 format)

* 90 DVD menus:
** all 89 Shout menus
** only 202.TheSidehackers from Rhino has a Menu video of Joel singing Love Pads The Film

* 61 movie trailers

* 14 MST Hour Wraps with Jack Perkins

* all 3 MST3K Video JukeBoxes 

* many interviews, documentaries, outtakes, convention panels, and more

* 110 still images (PNG format)

* 3 audio extras (MP3 format)

* 617 The Sword And The Dragon Vol24 has 2 shorts:
1) A Date With Your Family From 602 Invasion USA
2) Snow Thrills From 311 It Conquered The World

* Only 4 videos have chapters and all 4 are custom with names:
1) MST3K Video JukeBox Vol1 from 810 The Giant Spider Invasion Vol10
2) MST3K Video JukeBox Vol2 from 206 Ring Of Terror Vol11
3) MST3K Video JukeBox Vol3 from 612 The Starfighters Vol12
4) Vintage MST3K Promos from 611 Last Of The Wild Horses Vol23

* The files are sorted in folders by Volume/Singles and Company but the file naming is the same as the full MST movie MKV-AVC/AC3 encodes. So these extra files could be put in one directory with all the MST movies and all the files would be ordered by release number.

Handbrake 0.10.1.6962 20150308

Video: AVC encode
Width 720, Anamorphic Loose, Copping Manual 0 0 0 0
Deinterlace=Slower
FPS 29.97 Constant, Preset=Very Slow, Quality RF=20.0
Audio: AC3 Passthru 192Kbps

Single releases are RHINO
Vol01 to Vol12 are RHINO
Vol13+ are SHOUT

Big thanks to the online MST3K community for the DVD sources, some of which are out of print or hard to find. And to the one online member in particular who made this possible: thank you!!!

If these encodes were enjoyable, you don't have the original discs and you can afford them, please consider picking up some the official MST3K DVDs. The artwork, packaging, menus and extras with the DVDs are fantastic.

Please check out other MST3K, Rifftrax, Battlestar Galactica, DC Comics, documentaries, Star Trek Enterprise and more at:
